question: Which Indian armed force is set to host multi-nation military drill ‘Milan 2020’?
explanation: The Indian Navy will host multi-nation military drill \'Milan 2020\' at Visakhapatnam in March 2020 & will witness the participation of 41 nations from South Asia, Southeast Asia, Africa and Europe. The areas of cooperation include capacity building, marine domain awareness, training, hydrography, technical assistance, operational exercise.
